pullrequest.title: Enable word wrap for globals value column

content.raw:
Hi David,

I’ve had a go at improving on this with PR #35. However it has the interesting property that due to a Qt bug, I don’t think it will work on anything but the latest version of Qt, which is not yet in the conda repositories. So that’s a bit pointless right now. Hopefully conda will update their package soon and then people other than those on bleeding edge linux distros can actually test my PR \(regression testing in the meantime is still useful\).
content.html:
Hi David,

I’ve had a go at improving on this with PR #35. However it has the interesting property that due to a Qt bug, I don’t think it will work on anything but the latest version of Qt, which is not yet in the conda repositories. So that’s a bit pointless right now. Hopefully conda will update their package soon and then people other than those on bleeding edge linux distros can actually test my PR (regression testing in the meantime is still useful).
